attribute.name: description
attribute.value: API for the DOSGI implementation. This provides a proprietary interface to Remote Service Admin that works across frameworks and an API to manage _scopes_.

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Implements a gossip protocol to discover cluster members. Can be configured with com.paremus.gossip.netty.Config. This works somehow with the cluster manager in com.paremus.discovery.cluster

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: The implementation of Remote Service Admin and a distribution provider. The provider

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: A compatibility layer for promises ... likely

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: API bundle for the Paremus cluster manager. This allows access to the current clusters available on the current framework. Cluster Listeners are updated when new memebrs are detected, are updated, or are leaving.
